about_the_game:
❤️❤️❤️

By buying this DLC, you can help the development team continue creating fun experiences like BUG together with a deep and complex games like Drake Frontier.

In exchange for your generous support, we've prepared a colorful reward in BUG for you!

🌈 Happy Rainbow Mode 🌈

Turn it on by pressing Caps Lock. Now every new shot you make will bring a nice and colorful SMASH to the enemy.

We hope you enjoy BUG! Thanks for your support! 🙏🏻
